description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; in blue-green ink a bust-length image of a woman with a coat with a large collar and cuffs holding one hand to her chest and the other resting on an open book
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 8 | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: W. Gramatté E.158 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1883
portfolio: From Plate 4 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
title: Bird Girl (Sonia Gramatté), Plate 4 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
